1006.issue: [E1006] "common.titleLang" must not have ioBroker in the name. It is clear, for what this adapter was created. Now: {"en":"ioBroker simple terminal","de":"ioBroker einfaches Terminal","ru":"простой терминал ioBroker","pt":"terminal simples ioBroker","nl":"ioBroker eenvoudige terminal","fr":"Terminal simple ioBroker","it":"terminale semplice ioBroker","es":"Terminal simple de ioBroker","pl":"Prosty terminal ioBroker","zh-cn":"ioBroker 简单终端"}

1013.issue: [W1013] Please test whether adapter can support compact mode, if not set "common.compact:false" at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/io-package.json).

1027.issue: [W1027] Missing suggested translation into uk of "common.titleLang" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/io-package.json).

1029.issue: [E1029] Admin support not specified. Please add "common.adminUI.config = json|materialize|html|none"

1034.issue: [W1034] Missing suggested translation into uk of "common.desc" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/io-package.json).

1054.issue: [W1054] Missing suggested translation into uk of some "common.news" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/io-package.json).

1057.issue: [E1057] js-controller 2.0.0 listed as dependency but 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please update dependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/io-package.json).

1072.issue: [W1072] "common.localLink" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/io-package.json) is deprecated. Please define object "common.localLinks": { "_default": "..." }

1081.issue: [W1081] "common.license" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/io-package.json) is deprecated. Please define object "common.licenseInformation"

1084.issue: [W1084] "common.title" is deprecated and replaced by "common.titleLang". Please remove from [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/io-package.json).

1090.issue: [E1090] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/io-package.json).

1105.issue: [W1105] [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/io-package.json) schema validation error: Unknown property "localLink" in /common

4036.issue: [S4036] Consider adding .vscode/settings.json file with JSON schema definitions for better development experience with Visual Studio Code.

5022.issue: [S5022] Please consider migrating to admin 5 UI (jsonConfig) or react based UI.

8002.issue: [E8002] No topics found in the repository. Please go to "https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal", press the settings button beside the about title and add some topics.

8004.issue: [W8004] Please process issue [[#82] "Migration to ESLint 9 and @iobroker/eslint-config"](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/issues/82)

9006.issue: [S9006] .commitinfo file should be excluded by .gitignore, please add a line with text ".commitinfo" to .gitignore

0029.issue: [E0029] Node.js 18 is required as minimum, node.js 20 is recommended. Please change "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '0.10' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/package.json).

0033.issue: [E0033] @iobroker/adapter-core 2.6.8 specified. 3.2.3 is required as minimum, 3.3.2 (or newer) is current. Please update dependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/package.json)

0035.issue: [E0035] No devDependency declared for @iobroker/testing. Please add "@iobroker/testing":"5.1.1" to devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/package.json)

0036.issue: [E0036] @alcalzone/release-script 3.6.0 specified. 3.8.0 is required as minimum,  3.8.0 (or newer) is current. Please update devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/package.json)

0038.issue: [E0038] Attribute "licenses" in [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/package.json) is deprecated. Please remove and use "license": "NAME" attribute.

0060.issue: [E0060] uid-number listed as dependency and as optionalDependency.

0050.issue: [W0050] 'request' package is deprecated and no longer maintained. Consider migrating to native 'node:fetch' or 'axios' if more complex functionality is needed.

0051.issue: [W0051] "maintainers" attribute at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/package.json) is not documented. Please use "contributors" attribute.
